summary: Provides a thin wrapper around the rasterio library to read and write raster datasets, map file extensions to GDAL driver codes, and manage raster metadata for integration with the rest of the application.
business_intent: Enable the application to import and export geospatial raster data (e.g., GeoTIFF, AAIGRID) using rasterio, simplifying file format handling and ensuring compatibility with GDAL drivers.
